invite.subject: You're Invited! - Planted People
invite.text:
You have been invited to join the Planted People Beta.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to register:

https://www.plantedpeople.com/register/<invite-token>

confirmEmail.subject: Please confirm your email (user.email) - Planted People
confirmEmail.text:
You are receiving this because you have signed up for an account with Planted People.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to confirm your email address:

https://www.plantedpeople.com/confirm/<email-confirm-token>

If you did not sign up for Planted People, please ignore this email.

signup.subject: Please confirm your email (<user-email>) - Planted People
signup.text:
You are receiving this because you have signed up for an account with Planted People.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to confirm your email address:

https://www.plantedpeople.com/confirm/<token>

If you did not sign up for Planted People, please ignore this email.

confirmComplete.subject: Welcome to Planted People
confirmComplete.text:
Hello,

Welcome to Planted People, you can login to your account at the link below to get started.

https://www.plantedpeople.com/login

forgotPassword.subject: Password Reset - Planted People
forgotPassword.text:
You are receiving this because you (or someone else) have requested the reset of the password for your account.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process:

https://www.plantedpeople.com/reset/<token>

If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

passwordReset.subject: Your password has been changed - Planted People
passwordReset.text:
Hello,

This is a confirmation that the password for your account <user.email> has just been changed.

businessApproved.subject: Business Request Approved - Planted People
businessApproved.text:
Hello,

This is a confirmation that your business account (<company-name>) has just been approved.
